definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)

pinyin: yuan2 zhu1 xing2 li2 zi3 jiao1 huan4 ji4

sentences.english: Ion-exchange resin sells in market in form of filter.
sentences.chinese: 離子交換樹脂以濾芯的形式在市場上銷售。

sentences.english: A review considers polymer-supported, and ion-exchange resin catalysts.
sentences.chinese: 評論研究使用聚合物載體及離子交換樹脂催化劑。

sentences.english: The borosilicate glass was strengthened by using low temperature ion exchange method.
sentences.chinese: 採用低溫型離子交換法對硼硅酸鹽玻璃進行增強。

sentences.english: A method of purifying ZnSO4 by ion exchange resin is described.
sentences.chinese: 本文描述了利用離子交換樹脂提純硫酸鋅的方法。

sentences.english: I am familiar with kinds of ion exchange resins, active carbon, carclazyte adsorption and so on.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉各種離子交換樹脂活性碳白土吸附洗脫性能。

sentences.english: At present, the main method used in China in the production of potassium carbonate is ion-exchange method.
sentences.chinese: 目前國內碳酸鉀生產的主要方法是離子交換法。

sentences.english: Ion exchange and complexation reaction are the common chemical reactions observed in soil.
sentences.chinese: 離子交換和絡合反應是土壤中常見的化學反應。

sentences.english: The advantages and applications of solid-state ion exchange method for modifying zeolites are summarized.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了固態離子交換方法制備改性沸石的特點和應用。

sentences.english: There is the largest ion exchange degree at a heating temperature.
sentences.chinese: 在一定溫度下熱處理幹混樣品，存在最大離子交換度。

sentences.english: Technical specification of ion-exchange paper was provided in this parer.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了研製離子交換紙的設計技術指標。

sentences.english: The experiment studied the processing o'falkali'man-made mineral water by dynamic ion-exchange method.
sentences.chinese: 本實驗採用動態離子交換法生產“鹼性”人工礦泉水。

sentences.english: This essay introduces a way of preparing sodium nitrate from brine by ion ex-change technology.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了用離子交換從滷水中製取硝酸鈉的方法。

sentences.english: A novel ion exchange process had been developed for treating high concentration of sodium tungstate solution.
sentences.chinese: 開發了離子交換新工藝用於處理高濃度鎢酸鈉溶液。

sentences.english: The method of modified 13X molecular sieve by microwave composite ion-exchange was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹微波法對13X分子篩進行復合離子交換的方法。

sentences.english: Electrolytic recovery and ion exchange are used to recover silver from photo-processing wastewater.
sentences.chinese: 採用電解法和離子交換法回收洗相廢水中的銀。

sentences.english: Thrombin was further purified with CM ion-exchange liquid chromatographic column.
sentences.chinese: 凝血酶經CM離子交換液相層析柱進一步純化。
